Posts.Content: Thanks for the info, Gail. I will be having the procedure done at St. Thomas' am meeting with the surgeons today and will let you know what I decide to do as I think the surgery will happen soon. Josey
Posts.Title: Breast reconstruction with GAP flap

Posts.Content: Any advice about or from anyone who has had reconstruction using buttock tissue. What's the cosmetic appearance of the backside like afterwards? What is the recovery like. Anybody know where I can see some images please. Thanks
